title: A Discussion On Over-The-Counter Cough Syrup Misuse

media:group.media:title: A Discussion On Over-The-Counter Cough Syrup Misuse
media:group.media:description:
See @Chubbyemu video https://youtu.be/WPxb2IG9MOk
Featuring: Dr Sonal Jagasia
Patient GG depicted by @MerryRose Howley 
Additional patient depictions by @Whang! 

Video with @Whang! : https://youtu.be/QKIobyk6Isc

Audio version of this podcast: https://anchor.fm/chubbyemu
Tweet me: https://www.twitter.com/hemereview
IG me: https://www.instagram.com/hemereview
FB me: https://www.facebook.com/hemereview

Dextromethorphan is an over the counter cough medicine. It is for coughs. Misuse of it can cause life threatening side effects.

Thumbnail case courtesy of Dr Derek Smith, Radiopaedia.org, rID: 53692

References: 
Dextromethorphan, chlorphenamine and serotonin toxicity: case report and systematic literature review. https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21175434/

Case of Serotonin Syndrome Initially Presenting as Diffuse Body Pain. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6196581/

Serotonin Syndrome. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3865832

Bromism: An overlooked and elusive toxidrome from chronic dextromethorphan misuse. https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31864868/

Dextromethorphan-induced serotonin syndrome. https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19238739/

Cognitive Deterioration from Long-Term Misuse of Dextromethorphan:A Case Report. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1188627/

Pediatric Fatalities Associated With Over the Counter (Nonprescription) Cough and Cold Medications. https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19101060/

"DXM": a new drug of. https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/9624331/
